snippet.title: Amber Heard OFFICIALLY SENTENCED TO 4 YEARS In Prison! | Celebrity Craze
snippet.description:
Amber Heard Officially Gets Sentenced To 4 Years In Prison! | Celebrity Craze

While some celebrities prefer living a quiet life away from the public, others just have so many scandals following them. In this video, we are going to talk about Johnny Depp and Amber Heard, who have been on each other’s throats ever since they split up and how Amber Heard might be facing jail time for one mistake she made in all this.

With the initial court date being pushed back, Johnny Depp and Amber Heard have been given some more time in order to gather more evidence for their individual cases. For quite some time, the two were firing evidence at each other in order to win in court. 

Ever since the recent release of the footage of the LAPD officers from the penthouse night of Amber Heard and Johnny Depp, things have not been looking all too bright for Amber Heard. Her team has been working tirelessly in order to back up her side, however Johnny Depp seems to have made the attempt to strike back.

#AmberHeardJail​ #AmberHeard​ #AmberHeardCourt​ #JusticeForJohnny #JusticeforJohnnyDepp
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC-lZTlG05ETwyjDS1JQCv3w/featured?sub_confirmation=1
